com.joliciel.talismane.stats

Class Gaussian

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.stats.Gaussian

  • public class Gaussian
extends java.lang.Object

    Gaussian Function, allows you to plot a Gaussian Probability Density Function
